query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `job_postings` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `company` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `location` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `locationType` enum('remote','hybrid','onsite') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'remote',
  `country` varchar(100),
  `payRate` int NOT NULL,
  `payRateMax` int,
  `payCurrency` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'USD',
  `experienceLevel` enum('entry','mid','senior','lead') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'entry',
  `employmentType` enum('full_time','part_time','contract','freelance') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'full_time',
  `description` text NOT NULL,
  `responsibilities` text,
  `requirements` text,
  `requiredCertifications` text,
  `preferredCertifications` text,
  `benefits` text,
  `applicationUrl` varchar(500),
  `contactEmail` varchar(320),
  `status` enum('active','closed','draft') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
  `postedBy` int,
  `viewCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `applicationCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `expiresAt` timestamp,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `job_postings_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
)
command:

  `description` text NOT NULL,

  `expiresAt` timestamp,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `job_postings_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
